cause.description:
"in the future the oceans recede leaving the world with too many inhabitants and too little water. Adding to the chaos is the appearance of new powers among the people: creativity has become a physical force."
tower 8 is a virtual band created to house this futuristic world. it was funded by an MTV grant, which has now run out, so the project is facing extinction. please support them!
1. this project is AWESOME and UNDERFUNDED.
cause.mission: stop tower 8 from disappearing off the face of the internet
cause.name: save tower 8
